creature.name: rat
creature.description: You see a small rat that seems to be extremely hungry.

noise.value: Defend yourself! I can see you!
They're always after me Lucky Charms!!
Clovers and rainbows... stars and horseshoes...
Join me for a drink, lassie?
You, humans, never leave us alone!
You humans never leave us alone!
The end of the world is nigh...
You will never find the way out!
We mighty duergars will crush the dwarves!
Who wakes me from my meditation?
Think not to defy the dark elves!
Dwarves are the enemy ... but we kill all who cross our path!
I am the king of this area!
We will never return to the light
The Spider Queen will avenge me!
I want to grow to be mighty!
Keep away from me, sunlight dweller!
Keep away from me, sunlight dweller!
I seek the blood of a Semos Man!
You must bow before the Oni Queen.
The Queen of Spiders will take her revenge on you!
You may steal my money but you'll never take my heart!
You will never see the light again!
Worms will feast on your corpse!
I am become death, destroyer of worlds.
I am here to destroy all people.
Leave me now, before it is too late!
Your time to die has come!
My will be done over land and sky!
Mine is the Power and the Glory!
